Glove sockets act like
config.description: How should gems & runes treat glove sockets? This defines which effects from gems & runes are applied. RECOMMENDED: Weapon sockets since you're using hands & arms to attack, so it makes more sense.

config.name: Boot sockets act like
config.description: How should gems & runes treat boot sockets? This defines which effects from gems & runes are applied. RECOMMENDED: Armor sockets since boots don't usually act as weapons or shields.

config.name: Jewelry sockets act like
config.description: How should gems & runes treat ring and amulet sockets? This defines which effects from gems & runes are applied. RECOMMENDED: Shields to bring some variety, and jewelry is often encompassing resistance bonuses like shields do.
